snp2.5:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā gayāyaṃ viharati ṭaṅkitamañce sūcilomassa yakkhassa bhavane.
snp2.5:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena kharo ca yakkho sūcilomo ca yakkho bhagavato avidūre atikkamanti.
snp2.5:3.4: Atha kho kharo yakkho sūcilomaṃ yakkhaṃ etadavoca:
snp2.5:3.7: Yāvāhaṃ jānāmi yadi vā so samaṇo, yadi vā so samaṇako”ti.
snp2.5:4.1: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
snp2.5:4.4: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
snp2.5:5.2: Sace me na byākarissasi, cittaṃ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmi, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmī”ti.
snp2.5:6.1: “Na khvāhaṃ taṃ, āvuso, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya yo me cittaṃ vā khipeyya hadayaṃ vā phāleyya pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya.
snp2.5:6.2: Api ca tvaṃ, āvuso, puccha yadākaṅkhasī”ti.
snp2.5:6.3: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
